MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
## Step 4: Install the Azure Site Recovery Provider
1. On the VMM machine, create a directory by running the following command:

MarkdownFencedCodeBlock.code_block: $BinPath = $env:SystemDrive+"\Program Files\Microsoft System Center 2012 R2\Virtual Machine Manager\bin" pushd $BinPath $encryptionFilePath = "C:\temp\" .\DRConfigurator.exe /r /Credentials $VaultSettingFilePath /vmmfriendlyname $env:COMPUTERNAME /dataencryptionenabled $encryptionFilePath /startvmmservice
